faint_limit.comment: Faint limit used to select stars for red noise analysis

ccd_fit_degree.comment: Degree of polynomial used for CCD fit

mag_column.comment: Magnitude column in timeseries photometry HDF5 file to be used {raw: 11, dataset calibrated: 13, cross-calibrated: 23, revised noise model: 25}

mag_err_column.comment: Magnitude error column in timeseries photometry HDF5 file to be used {raw: 12, dataset calibrated: 14, cross-calibrated: 24, revised noise model: 26}

exclude_stars.comment: List of star identifiers to be excluded from the analysis

fit_parameters.comment:
List of parameters to be fitted, may include: ['airmass','CCD_X','CCD_Y','exposure','background',
                      'seeing','time','phot_scale_factor','frames']

output_star_indices.comment: List of star indices to produce diagnostic plots for [dataset star index]
